author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposes a simple analyzer in the ```SimGeneral/TrackingAnalysis/test``` area to dump and permit direct visual inspection of the ```TrackingVertex``` and ```TrackingParticle``` event content. 

It is effectively an update of the old, and as far as I can see not maintained/properly working, ```TrackingTruthOutputTest``` class, that could be possibly replaced by it.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, run, and produce the desired output.
title: Simulation: add test code to dump TrackingParticle/TrackingVertex event content
